name: Gerber Armbar Slim Drive Multi-Tool
description: A compact multi-tool that puts a few key tools into a compact package that won’t weigh you down. The tool that sets the Armbar Drive apart is its ¼in. hex driver, giving you a proper folding screwdriver with interchangeable bits. Bundled into this slim package is a locking blade and a few other tools that will make everyday life a little easier.420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.Liner-lock design keeps fingers safe when using the knife.Slim design is only 1.5cm thick.Driver head aligns the screwdriver with the center of the handle letting you apply even torque.Head fits standard ¼ in. bits, easy to find the right one, and you can mix and match with bits you already own.Fold-out backspacer contains a bottle opener and a compact prybar.
